body.name: LIVEHOM Dresser for Bedroom with 11 Drawer, Dressers & Chests of Drawers with Side Pockets, Hooks, Fabric Storage Drawer, Steel Frame, Wood Top, Organizer Unit and Pull Handle for Closet.
features: [11-Drawer Dresser For Storage] LIVEHOM Chest of Drawers Designed with 11 individually collapsible drawers, including 3 drawers for small items, 2 drawers with 2 compartments for medium size items and 6 large size drawers for Large size items. The fabric dresser for the bedroom offers endless organizational possibilities.

[Design With Side Pockets & Hooks] LIVEHOM dressers extra design 1 side pocket and 2 side hooks. The side pockets allow for more detailed storage, adding extra space for thin items and the hooks allow for easy access to bags and umbrella, bringing more convenience to your life.

[Keep Room Tidy] The storage dresser take full advantage of vertical space, when your messy clothes nowhere to go, stack up and put it into the dresser drawers - wherever clutter, tidy soon. Wood panel can hold handbags, hats, keys, glasses, headphones and keep them in your hands. Give you a comfortable environment and bright mood.

[Sturdy and Durable] The drawers are made of double X sturdy steel frame, high-grade fabric and wood panel with adjustable feet to ensure the stability of dresser drawers. LIVEHOM dresser drawers can be used indoors for years. The height of the bottom of the shelf is designed for easy cleaning and sweeping.

[Easy to Assemble] With clear assembly instructions step by step and numbered parts inside the package, you will get a new dresser in no time. If you have any questions about our 11-drawer dresser, please feel free to contact us, your satisfaction is our top priority.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 536 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #60,369 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #123 in Dressers & Chests of Drawers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy build, slim but holds a lot. Bought this as a secondary wardrobe and it looks really nice. I like how there’s hooks on one side for hats or Barrett’s, and compartment holder on the other sides. Stored excess books and easy to grab items for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Kids Room
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t want to invest in a huge dresser for my daughter and this was an easy to assemble alternative (and much cheaper). The drawers are sturdy for fabric squares and the top shelf is perfect for her lamp and knock knacks. Doesn’t wobble as I try to open and close either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Low Price Option
reviews.reviewText: I was downsizing from a large solid wood dresser without downsizing my wardrobe and was so pleasantly surprised that everything fit. So far I've been impressed that despite the drawers being fabric they seem to be pretty sturdy. I was a little surprised because the front of the drawers looked a little more real in the pictures but are definitely fabric. They look fine from a distance though so I don't really care. My biggest complaint is I bought this specific dresser for the side storage and they look absolutely nothing like what was shown in the picture for this color. That was very disappointing and it makes it look more of like a college dorm item. Otherwise pretty pleased. (Also, yes there was a smell, but I did not find it that offensive and it went away in a few days.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage and fairly easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Measurements provided are accurate so important to measure before purchasing. I wouldn't consider this a long term piece of furniture but it offers the storage I need and looks nice tucked away in a closet. I would recommend. So much so, that I bought a second one (different style).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Buy It
reviews.reviewText: It was better than I expected. I know it’s not a super long term item, but for the price it works. It’s sturdy and the drawers are big, and deep enough for so many items. My husband put it together with ease and it’s awesome so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dresser is awesome
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this dresser for a second dresser in our bedroom. The drawers are deep and slide easily. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. Sturdy construction. Looks great. I will purchase more in the future for the other rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pole 7 has a piece of metal over the thread so the screw can’t be tightened in. This is one of the main poles to build the dresser base so the whole purchase was a waste of time. Now I’m going to have to return the entire thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent except for the smell.
reviews.reviewText: We bought two of these for young children. The assembly was straightforward, but both kits were missing one bolt. I found bolts at a local hardware store. The drawers seem sturdy for fabric drawers and I like the dividers. The drawers pull all the way out very easily, so we'll see how that works with the kids. My big concern is a very strong smell which, while not offensive, has triggered my allergies. My head is very stuffy and I sneeze whenever I enter the room where they are. They have been set up for several days now and it hasn't abate too much. Doesn't seem to bother the kids, but I am going take all the drawers back out and air them to see if that helps. I'm concerned about their effect on little ones.
